# Project Summary

With this project I will try to visualize and understand the traffic
accident data for India as publicly accessible
[here](https://data.gov.in/).

# Project Goals

1.  Visualize traffic information and find trends

2.  Find outliers and see if any valuable info can be dugout for each
    state or overall.

3.  Try to predict number of accidents or other useful information.
